desc: 测试插入出差本表以及行程子表
name: InsertTravelSelfAndTrip

oqls.desc: 插入出差记以及行程（带变量）
oqls.name: InsertTravelAndTripVars
oqls.oql: insert into Travel(applyId, applyName, TravelTrip(fromAddr, toAddr, creator)) values (#{applyId}, #{applyName}, #{trips})
oqls.detailSql: insert into TRAVEL_TRIP(APPLY_ID, FROM_ADDR, TO_ADDR, CREATOR_NAME, CREATOR_KEY) values (#{applyId}, #{fromAddr}, #{toAddr}, #{creator.name}, #{creator.key})
